segments.text: I think about how the woman has no idea of the impending disaster lurking behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way she focuses on that plate is almost admirable, yet so misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why is she not aware of the water gushing over?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the boy, reaching into the cookie jar like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see how the girl anticipates a treat, her little hand reaching out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That bustling kitchen contrasts starkly with the calm garden outside; it’s so surreal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to pool, and I feel disgusted by how easily distractions can blind us.
segments.speaker: PAR
